titles: Some thoughts on the character of Solomon's vertuous woman preach'd in a sermon at the parish-church of Croydon, on the ocacasion of Q. Mary's death, January the 6th, 1694-5 / printed at the request of those that heard it by John Evans.
author: Evans, John, 17th cent.
notes: This work is found on reels 1187:11 and 1402:6.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
